name: Never Leave Quietly
description:
Never Leave Quietly

I like to make word art. And teach lessons. 
https://objkt.com/collection/KT1H45qDRFbU6v3fH2TtMduKdTdLK2Z9ZCjs

This is one for all of us. 

Shout out to WEB Dubois for being the father of infographics, for merging science, art, information to share complex ideas creatively.

I was inspired by reading a recent publication about his pioneering work, W. E. B. Du Bois's Data Portraits: Visualizing Black America
https://www.smithsonianmag.com/history/first-time-together-and-color-book-displays-web-du-bois-visionary-infographics-180970826/

NFT owner has the right to resell the art NFT, to publicly perform and publicly display the art. Owner may not reproduce, prepare derivatives, or distribute copies, without the consent of and credit to the original creators.
